title: Digital Learning Playground: Mixed Reality-Based Mathematical Game Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic arithmetic operations and geometric concepts
context.additional_context: Experiential mathematics learning utilizing game elements in a mixed reality (MR) environment, enabling personalized feedback and collaborative task completion for each learner

learning_goals: Learners can solve volume/surface area calculation problems with 85% accuracy by manipulating 3D geometric shapes in a mixed-reality space.
Learners can perform the process of converting real-life problems (e.g., architectural design) into mathematical modeling four or more times in a game-based simulation.
Learners can collaborate with peers to complete a data visualization task in an MR environment for project-based assessments (achieving at least 3 out of 4 on the evaluation rubric).
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
